Description:
IN served - IN/MH/210322/G15/1 - You have failed to ensure that lifting equipment (specifically the Laycock Two-Post Vehicle Lift SN 1798), which is exposed to conditions causing deterioration which is liable to result in dangerous situations, has been thoroughly examined by a competent person after exceptional circumstances occurred which were liable to jeopardise the safety of the lifting equipment. (Specifically, removal of the safety locking mechanism from connection to an arm of the said lift.)
IN served - IN/MH/210322/G15/2 - You have failed to ensure that lifting equipment (specifically the Laycock Two-Post Vehicle Lift SN 2862), which is exposed to conditions causing deterioration which is liable to result in dangerous situations, has been thoroughly examined by a competent person after exceptional circumstances occurred, which were liable to jeopardise the safety of the lifting equipment. (Specifically, removal of the safety locking mechanism from connection to an arm of the said lift.)
